name: Old School Horror Game: Bright Day
name_original: Old School Horror Game: Bright Day
description:
"Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that" - 2Pac

In this Old School Game you must find all the 7 dolls to try to escape from this place.
Good Luck !!

This Game is made by the Old School Way to make Horror Games, it means that it isn't made by a multimillionaire Company trying to make the fear games the most ergonomic for kids by a 30 devs team, this game is hard and is only made by our small indie company.


If you are nostalgic of playing the horror games of 10 years ago, then this game is for you !!
